projects.title: Amazon Clone

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: A fully functional browser game where two players can compete. Includes game logic, win tracking, and replay options.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: A fun interactive game where the player competes against the computer. Includes random AI, score tracking, and animations.

projects.title: Warehouse Management System
